episodes.title: Surviving a Doomsday Cult
episodes.description: This week, special guest & friend of the pod Cherish joins Lucy to discuss her experience leaving the Children of God cult, building a new life in the US, and her reflections since.Additional resources on the Children of God:Books Sex Cult Nun by Faith Jones Not Without My Sister by Celeste Jones, Kristina Jones, and Juliana Buhring Cult Following by Bexy Cameron Documentaries/TV Children of the Cult (2021) Cults and Extreme Belief, Episode 3 (2018) Children of God: Lost and Found (2007) If you’re able to and our content means something to you, you can support us on ⁠⁠Patreon⁠⁠ ❤️
